title: Globular Jar
description: spherical jar with 4 small double strand lug handles below mouth; crinilated rib around center of body; 4 floral medallions between handles; 8 medallions with pairs of cranes holding fish alternating tassels and lotus pods on body; green glaze pooling to bright blue; bottom 1/3 unglazed
creditline: Gift of Ruth and Bruce Dayton
